title: Erased Time For You - Novel Updates

description:
At the succession ceremony of the Baronet of Palmer, there was a terrible incident.

Terrence, caught up in this, returns to his mansion after ten days with the young Rachel Palmer in his arms, but he has to leave for the battlefield and left Rachel behind.

Terrence then returned after two years with the news of victory.>
